home.headline: Los Alcázares - Your Perfect Holiday Destination on the Costa Cálida
home.description:
Experience unforgettable vacation days in our comfortable holiday apartments in Los Alcázares and Los Urrutias, two charming coastal towns on the sunny Costa Cálida in the Murcia Region. Both locations are situated directly on the Mar Menor, Europe's largest saltwater lagoon, and offer ideal conditions for relaxation, water sports, and Mediterranean lifestyle.
15 minutes from San Javier Airport (Murcia)50 minutes from Alicante Airport
Los Alcázares delights with its 7 kilometers of fine sandy beach, shallow water, and a beautiful beach promenade with cozy cafés and restaurants. Here, Spanish joie de vivre, culinary pleasure, and maritime flair come together.Whether swimming, sailing, kitesurfing, or stand-up paddling – the calm waters of the Mar Menor are ideal for beginners and families. In the evenings, tapas bars and beach restaurants invite you to linger while you enjoy the sunset over the lagoon.
Just a few minutes away lies Los Urrutias, a quiet, authentic coastal town with wide beaches and magnificent views of La Manga. Here you'll find peace and relaxation away from the tourist crowds – ideal for couples and nature lovers.In the immediate vicinity, numerous nature and hiking areas await you, such as the Calblanque Nature Reserve, which delights with pristine coves, dune landscapes, and turquoise waters.
Relief for rheumatic and dermatological conditionsPromotion of respiratory system and circulationNatural skin care through mineral-rich mudA bath in the Mar Menor is therefore not only relaxation, but also a blessing for body and mind.
15 golf courses in the immediate vicinity, including the renowned La Manga ClubModern sports centers with tennis, padel, football, and fitnessCycling tours and hikes through picturesque landscapesBoat trips and day trips to the Mediterranean
Cartagena – Historic port city with Roman ruins, museums, and cruise ship atmosphereMurcia – Vibrant capital with impressive cathedral and old townLa Manga del Mar Menor – The famous strip of land between the lagoon and the MediterraneanMula – Pure relaxation in the natural thermal springs
Whether family vacation, active vacation, or romantic getaway – in our holiday apartments in Los Alcázares and Los Urrutias you'll experience Mediterranean joie de vivre, relaxation, and pure sunshine.

about.headline: About Us
about.description: <root><content><texts><text>We, Olaf and Tina, had long dreamed of emigrating to Spain. Olaf is half-Spanish, his mother comes from the Murcia region. We have owned an apartment in Los Urrutias for years. In 2024, we then took the plunge, sold everything in Germany and emigrated completely to Spain. We are self-employed here with a small German service and now want to give others the opportunity to get to know the flair and lifestyle of this area.</text><text>We love this country and want to inspire others about it too. It is important to us that we as landlords are always on site and available as contact persons. The rental is handled by us personally. This means for you as our tenants that we carry out a final inspection (when tenants depart), so that it is ensured that you will not experience any unpleasant surprises upon arrival and the apartment is in perfect condition.</text></texts></content></root>

descriptions.1: The protection of your personal data is of particular concern to me. I therefore process your data exclusively on the basis of legal provisions (GDPR, TMG). In this privacy policy, I inform you about which data is collected when visiting this website and how I handle it.
descriptions.2: The data controller for data processing on this website is:
descriptions.3/headline: 3. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
descriptions.3: This website can generally be visited without providing personal data. No cookies are set and no tracking or analysis tools are used.
descriptions.4: If you contact me via the form on the website, the data you provide (e.g., name, email address, message) will be stored by me for the purpose of processing your inquiry and in case of follow-up questions. This data will not be shared without your consent and will not be used for other purposes.
descriptions.5: The processing of data is carried out in accordance with Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR (for the performance of a contract or pre-contractual measures).
descriptions.6: The hosting provider of this website may automatically collect and store information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits. These may include:
descriptions.7: This data cannot be assigned to specific persons. No merging of this data with other data sources is undertaken. The data serves solely for technical monitoring and security of the website.
descriptions.8: You are generally entitled to the following rights:
descriptions.8/3: Deletion of your data (provided there is no legal retention obligation)
descriptions.9: If you believe that the processing of your data violates data protection law, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent data protection supervisory authority.
descriptions.10: For questions about the collection, processing or use of your personal data, as well as for information, correction, blocking or deletion of data, please contact: casas.marmenor@gmx.de

empty.headline: Our guestbook is still empty...
empty.text: But it doesn't have to stay that way! We would be very happy if you left the first entry. Whether it's a kind greeting, a nice compliment, or your impression of the visit – your contribution marks the beginning and brings a smile to others as well.

descriptions.1/headline: We look forward to your entry!
descriptions.1: Did you feel comfortable? Would you like to share a special moment with us or simply leave a few kind words? Then please feel free to write us an entry in our guestbook. Your feedback is important to us and brings great joy not only to us, but also to future guests.
